pageContext.claim: “Some members of the media are very Angry at the Fake Story in the New York Times. They actually called to complain and apologize - a big step forward. From the day I announced, the Times has been Fake News, and with their disgusting new Board Member, it will only get worse!”
pageContext.analysis: It would be highly unusual for members of media organizations to apologize for a competitor's coverage. The New York Times stood behind their story.
